Computer security is like protecting a house. You lock doors, set alarms, and use strong passwords to keep out bad guys. It's like having a secret code that only you and your friends know. But remember, even the strongest locks can be picked if you're not careful. So, always keep your software up-to-date and never share your secret codes with strangers. That's how you keep your digital home safe.
